entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #61055
  • Double clicking inline text hint for var inserts incorrectly #61052
  • editorconfig designer view fails to load when restored during solution load #61050
  • Adding .editorconfig immediately after cloning a repro fails to open/render editorconfig designer #61049
  • error IDE0055 - seems inconsistent running in Devops #61042
  • How to correctly extract all Statements and all Comment Trivia from `SyntaxBlock`s #61041
  • C# Interactive window doesn't show error squiggles when Pull Diagnostics is turned on #61033

Closed

  • IDE does not offer name simplification for global using type aliases #59042
    17.2
  • provide fix all ability to CodeRefactoringProvider #32461
    Backlog
  • No warning for obsolete constructor when using generic `new()` constraint #61009
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra new line character from end of file #61056
    Area-IDE, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Fix double-click on inline-hints for 'var' #61053
    Area-IDE
  • Update config for VS branch snap #61051
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support adding multiple parameters on new lines past the original last parameter #61048
    Area-IDE
  • Backport build yml and publishing script changes #61043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Prevent EnC error when changing partial methods with lambdas #61039
    Area-Interactive
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add PROTOTYPE comments for test cases #61038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix nullability of source link service #61037
    Area-IDE
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC #61032
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Use IAsyncDisposable instead of AsyncLazy<T> for lazy cancellation of final OOP request #61020
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Null check semantic tokens workspace capability #61047
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update simplify-type-names to understand global imports. #60872
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #61046
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61036
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #61026
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61035
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Temporarily disable editorconfig tests on linux (#61018) #61031
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61059
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61058
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Make NamingPreferences message-pack serializable #61006
    Area-IDE
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community
